name: Goldshaft Deluxe
overview: Bedlam City 1976: The city is stunned by a crime wave. The streets are full of dealers. Robbery and murder have become usual. Most policemen are bribed. There seems to be no chance to get out of this nightmare. The big boss - Ugly Fat Joe - controls everything and everybody. There is only one man who could kick these bastards out of the city... Goldshaft! He's got his nickname for being tougher than shaft and for using huge amounts of "Gold Taft" harspray. Yes baby, your guess is right! You are Goldshaft! So move your butt and slash them into pieces.
